spiritsExplanation: The workout is classified primarily under 'Outdoor & Adventure' and 'Flow & Rhythm'. 'High-Energy & Intense' or 'Structured & Disciplined' considerations were excluded due to the warm-up nature and lack of explicit high-intensity or structured training indicators.
